answers.answer: The best thing you can do is to talk over your fears with your doc. They'll be able to discuss with everything you can do to take care of yourself now whicg will hopefully relieve some of your fears.

question: I can't talk about this with my family cause they make things bigger than what they are, but I'm getting scare, I have gestational diabetes and I'm only 15 weeks, and plus, my possibilities of getting preclampsia are very high, I want to have a healty baby, this is my first baby, and I'm scared that something happen to my baby or in the birth
title: just venting
